book.synopsis: In 1462, twenty-one-year-old widower and merchant/adventurer Niccolo and his private army become caught between warring factions--respectively led by Queen Carlotta and her brother, James--battling for control of Cyprus
book.title_long: Race Of Scorpions (House of Niccolo Dorothy Dunnett)
